review: After asking for suggestions about controlling fire tv with a usb remote I tried it. The Logitech unifying usb reciever and mouse or keyboard mouse combination work great. I discovered that you can use the Fire tv controller,usb unifying mouse, and wireless keyboard with built in mouse all at once to make searching very easy. You need to turn off other Fire devices to do the install,then tun them back on.

review: It streams movies when I have enough data, but so do several other media players, most of which cost less.  I bought this thinking that the USB port would allow me to move movies that I own to a flash drive to have a library available when I get close to my monthly data cap.  Unfortunately, Amazon only wants you to be able to stream.  It's unbelievable that they would deliberately leave off a very simple feature that could make this device more versatile.  I'll never buy anything with any of Amazon's operating systems again.  It still gets three stars because it's faster than my Roku, and I can play a lot of free Amazon App Store games on it.  I really don't like rooting anything, but I'm going to give it a shot.  If I brick it, I'll just throw it away and buy a different media player.
